statement: 14. Labyrinth-14time limit per test8 secondsmemory limit per test512 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputSee the problem statement here:http://codeforces.com/contest/921/problem/01.

processed.result:
You are given a grid of $N \times M$ cells. Some cells are blocked, and some are empty. You start at the top-left corner of the grid and want to reach the bottom-right corner. You can only move down or right.

Determine the number of distinct paths you can take to reach the bottom-right corner.

You are given a grid of cells. Some cells contain obstacles. You start at a designated cell and need to reach another designated cell. You can only move up, down, left, or right. Find the shortest path between the two cells, avoiding obstacles.
